ValidationRule.description: Prevents reps from approving their own approval records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OwnerId = Current_User_ID__c , sbaa__AssignedTo__r.Id != Current_User_ID__c , ISCHANGED(sbaa__Status__c), TEXT(sbaa__Status__c) = 'Approved', NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not approve your own approval.
